message: Let's be fair and avoid the risks of inflation. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think we can both do better. Let's flip the script on your last offer - 60/40 in my favor.  It's a better starting point for both of us to avoid any losses due to inflation.
Bob, playing hardball will hurt us both.  I'm offering a more reasonable 55/45 split. Let's settle this before inflation eats away at the value.
